segments.text: Are you going to helen ’ s birthday party on Friday evening ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I wouldn ’ t miss it for the world ! It ’ s sure to be fun . She ’ s invited a lot of people . Do you think everyone will be able to get into her house ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: If everyone turned up , it would be a squeeze . But a few people said that they couldn ’ t go . So I think it should be OK ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ Ve got her a birthday present and I ’ ll take a bottle fo wine too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s a good idea . She told me that she had bought plenty of food and snacks . I think it ’ s going to be a noisy party . I hope her neighbors don ’ t mind too much .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Helen gets on very well with her neighbors . I wouldn ’ t be surprised if they went to the party too .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m really looking forward to it . This party is going to be a blast !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , don ’ t be late . I ’ ll see you on Friday at helen ’ s .
segments.speaker: S1
